data.title: If Billy Beane managed a media company
data.meta_description: Baseball is America’s past-time sport (and a passion of mine), and after months of binge-watching all sorts of old sports programs and movies I asked myself: if I was the lead character from the true story Moneyball, how would I build the best content from a media conglomerate’s perspective. These are my views.
